verses.verse: וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> will come בְּאַחֲרִ֣ית <WH319> But in the last הַיָּמִ֗ים <WH3117> days יִ֠הְיֶה <WH1961> will come הַ֣ר <WH2022> it shall come to pass [that] the mountain בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of the LORD נָכוֹן֙ <WH3559> shall be established בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> in the top הֶהָרִ֔ים <WH2022> of the mountains וְנִשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> and it shall be exalted ה֖וּא <WH1931> he מִגְּבָע֑וֹת <WH1389> above the hills וְנָהֲר֥וּ <WH5102> shall flow עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and עַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> and people

וְֽהָלְכ֞וּ <WH1980> shall come גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּ֗ים <WH7227> And many וְאָֽמְרוּ֙ <WH559> and say לְכ֣וּ ׀ <WH1980> Come וְנַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> and let us go up אֶל־ <WH413> to הַר־ <WH2022> to the mountain יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to בֵּית֙ <WH1004> and to the house אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> of the God יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob וְיוֹרֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH3384> and he will teach מִדְּרָכָ֔יו <WH1870> us of his ways וְנֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> may walk בְּאֹֽרְחֹתָ֑יו <WH734> in his paths כִּ֤י <WH3588> from מִצִּיּוֹן֙ <WH6726> of Zion תֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> shall go forth תוֹרָ֔ה <WH8451> for the law וּדְבַר־ <WH1697> and the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God מִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> from Jerusalem

וְשָׁפַ֗ט <WH8199> And he shall judge בֵּ֚ין <WH996> between עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> people רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> among many וְהוֹכִ֛יחַ <WH3198> and rebuke לְגוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> nations עֲצֻמִ֖ים <WH6099> strong עַד־ <WH5704> against רָח֑וֹק <WH7350> afar off וְכִתְּת֨וּ <WH3807> and they shall beat חַרְבֹתֵיהֶ֜ם <WH2719> their swords לְאִתִּ֗ים <WH855> into plowshares וַחֲנִיתֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <WH2595> and their spears לְמַזְמֵר֔וֹת <WH4211> into pruninghooks לֹֽא־ <WH3808> and never יִשְׂא֞וּ <WH5375> shall not lift up גּ֤וֹי <WH1471> nation אֶל־ <WH413> against גּוֹי֙ <WH1471> against nation חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> a sword וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and never יִלְמְד֥וּן <WH3925> neither shall they learn ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> war

וְיָשְׁב֗וּ <WH3427> But they shall sit אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man תַּ֧חַת <WH8478> under גַּפְנ֛וֹ <WH1612> under his vine וְתַ֥חַת <WH8478> and under תְּאֵנָת֖וֹ <WH8384> and under his fig tree וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> no מַחֲרִ֑יד <WH2729> and none shall make [them] afraid כִּי־ <WH3588> For פִ֛י <WH6310> for the mouth יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts דִּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> hath spoken

כִּ֚י <WH3588> Though כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> For all people יֵלְכ֕וּ <WH1980> walk אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every one בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> in the name אֱלֹהָ֑יו <WH430> of his god וַאֲנַ֗חְנוּ <WH587> we נֵלֵ֛ךְ <WH1980> will walk בְּשֵׁם־ <WH8034> in the name יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> our God לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> and ever פ

בַּיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֜וּא <WH1931> he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֹֽסְפָה֙ <WH622> will I assemble הַצֹּ֣לֵעָ֔ה <WH6760> her that halteth וְהַנִּדָּחָ֖ה <WH5080> her that is driven out אֲקַבֵּ֑צָה <WH6908> and I will gather וַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> whom הֲרֵעֹֽתִי׃ <WH7489> and her that I have afflicted

וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <WH7760> And I will make אֶת־ <WH853> הַצֹּֽלֵעָה֙ <WH6760> her that halted לִשְׁאֵרִ֔ית <WH7611> a remnant וְהַנַּהֲלָאָ֖ה <WH1972> and her that was cast far off לְג֣וֹי <WH1471> nation עָצ֑וּם <WH6099> a strong וּמָלַ֨ךְ <WH4427> shall reign יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> and the LORD עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> over בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> over them in mount צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> Zion מֵעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> now וְעַד־ <WH5704> from henceforth even for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever פ

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you מִגְדַּל־ <WH4026> And thou O tower עֵ֗דֶר <WH5739> of the flock עֹ֛פֶל <WH6076> the strong hold בַּת־ <WH1323> of the daughter צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> of Zion עָדֶ֣יךָ <WH5704> against תֵּאתֶ֑ה <WH857> unto thee shall it come וּבָאָ֗ה <WH935> shall come הַמֶּמְשָׁלָה֙ <WH4475> dominion הָרִ֣אשֹׁנָ֔ה <WH7223> even the first מַמְלֶ֖כֶת <WH4467> the kingdom לְבַ֥ת־ <WH1323> to the daughter יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

עַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> Now לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> why תָרִ֖יעִי <WH7321> Now why dost thou cry רֵ֑עַ <WH7452> aloud הֲמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אֵֽין־ <WH369> no בָּ֗ךְ אִֽם־ <WH518> Or יוֹעֲצֵךְ֙ <WH3289> in thee? is thy counsellor אָבָ֔ד <WH6> perished כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הֶחֱזִיקֵ֥ךְ <WH2388> have taken חִ֖יל <WH2427> ? for pangs כַּיּוֹלֵדָֽה׃ <WH3205> thee as a woman in travail

ח֧וּלִי <WH2342> Be in pain וָגֹ֛חִי <WH1518> and labour to bring forth בַּת־ <WH1323> O daughter צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> of Zion כַּיּֽוֹלֵדָ֑ה <WH3205> like a woman in travail כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For עַתָּה֩ <WH6258> now תֵצְאִ֨י <WH3318> for now shalt thou go forth מִקִּרְיָ֜ה <WH7151> out of the city וְשָׁכַ֣נְתְּ <WH7931> and thou shalt dwell בַּשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> in the field וּבָ֤את <WH935> and thou shalt go עַד־ <WH5704> against בָּבֶל֙ <WH894> [even] to Babylon שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> There תִּנָּצֵ֔לִי <WH5337> there shalt thou be delivered שָׁ֚ם <WH8033> There יִגְאָלֵ֣ךְ <WH1350> shall redeem יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> there the LORD מִכַּ֖ף <WH3709> thee from the hand אֹיְבָֽיִךְ׃ <WH341> of thine enemies

וְעַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> and now נֶאֶסְפ֥וּ <WH622> are gathered עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> against גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> Now also many הָאֹמְרִ֣ים <WH559> against thee that say תֶּחֱנָ֔ף <WH2610> Let her be defiled וְתַ֥חַז <WH2372> look בְּצִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> upon Zion עֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5869> and let our eye

וְהֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> like לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יָֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> But they know מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת <WH4284> not the thoughts יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not הֵבִ֖ינוּ <WH995> neither understand עֲצָת֑וֹ <WH6098> they his counsel כִּ֥י <WH3588> for קִבְּצָ֖ם <WH6908> for he shall gather כֶּעָמִ֥יר <WH5995> them as the sheaves גֹּֽרְנָה׃ <WH1637> into the floor

ק֧וּמִי <WH6965> Arise וָד֣וֹשִׁי <WH1758> and thresh בַת־ <WH1323> O daughter צִיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> of Zion כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For קַרְנֵ֞ךְ <WH7161> thine horn אָשִׂ֤ים <WH7760> for I will make בַּרְזֶל֙ <WH1270> iron וּפַרְסֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH6541> thy hoofs אָשִׂ֣ים <WH7760> and I will make נְחוּשָׁ֔ה <WH5154> brass וַהֲדִקּ֖וֹת <WH1854> and thou shalt beat in pieces עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> people רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> many וְהַחֲרַמְתִּ֤י <WH2763> and I will consecrate לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD בִּצְעָ֔ם <WH1214> covet וְחֵילָ֖ם <WH2428> and their substance לַאֲד֥וֹן <WH113> unto the Lord כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the whole earth
